course.title: MAT 1374 Probability and Games of Chance: Poker 101 (3 units)
course.desc: An introduction to elementary probability theory, game theory, and the mathematical underpinning of games of chance, demonstrated through their applications to poker games such as Texas Hold'em. Societal aspects of gaming.Course Component: LectureThis course cannot count as a science elective for students in the Faculty of Science.
